Options.subtitle: The "General Software Engineer" Approach
Options.title: Custom Unix Shell Implementation | Academic Project
bullets: Engineered a functional command-line interface in C (GNU11), utilizing core Unix system calls (fork, exec, waitpid) to manage process lifecycle and execution flow.

Options.project: Custom Unix Shell Implementation | Academic Project
Options.subtitle: The "Systems & Embedded" Approach
Options.title: POSIX-Compliant Unix Shell | Systems Programming
bullets: Developed a custom shell capable of parsing and executing user commands with support for piping, redirection, and built-in utilities (cd, exit, history).

Options.title: Secure User Management System | Academic Project
bullets: Engineered a robust authentication system using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) and bcrypt for secure, stateless session management and password hashing.
